amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in H. Rept. 105-679 to prohibit any funds to be used on a program which distributes needles for the hypodermic injection of any illegal drug and prevent payments to any persons or entities who carry out such a program.

action.text: On agreeing to the Tiahrt amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 250 - 169 (Roll No. 412).
